extendedInfo.description: Always stay connected with the Battlelog mobile app. Check your stats, see what your friends are doing in the feed, and get the latest news.Battlelog is a social platform with a rich amount of stats that powers Battlefieldâ¢ 3, allowing you to connect and play with friends, and follow the progress of your own and your friendsâ soldiers to see who can rise to the top.This free app gives you the ability to keep up to date on what is happening right now on Battlelog and how your friends are progressing.Battlelog Features:- Battle Feed: Get real-time notifications when your friends unlock new weapons or get new awards. âHooah!â and comment on their posts.- Com Center: See which friends are playing right now and what servers they are playing on. View your friendsâ profiles and plan for tonightâs game by leaving a message on their feed.- Stats & Unlocks: Keep a close eye on your performance on the battlefield with detailed soldier stats. Check out the dog tags you have collected from your foes and see what new weapons, gadgets, and upgrades you are about to unlock next.- Assignments: Track your progress towards the criteria of each assignment and see which ones you're closest to completing next.- Leaderboards: Compare your standing among your Origin friends and view the top worldwide players on the global leaderboard.- News: Stay up to date with the latest Battlelog and Battlefield news. Get essential updates directly from DICE, the developers of Battlefield 3.Supported Games:- Battlefieldâ¢ 3- Medal of Honorâ¢: Warfighter

reviews.title: Small tweaks needed.
reviews.comment: Would like ability to sort medals by name, progress, count, etc. Would like to see dog tags not yet unlocked. Overall great effort, hope the BF4 version doesn\'t take this long to come out.
reviews.author: Brett Karpowicz

reviews.title: It has its flaws
reviews.comment: It\'s pretty good, but a lot of the time it force closes and it won\'t let me Check how close I am to unlocking new assignments. Instead it will just stay blank. Other than that it\'s fine.
reviews.author: Luis Gutierrez

reviews.title: Battlelog is finally here!
reviews.comment: Just downloaded this app and so far it works great on my Galaxy S2X! It runs nice and i like the interface design. Really hope that more features are added before BF4 is released such as chat and forums
reviews.author: Jayson MacKinnon

reviews.title: Issues
reviews.comment: I was excited to see that Battlelog had finally made its way to android and I quickly downloaded it. However, my phone does not let me scroll in pages, other than that everything works great. HTC EVO 3d
reviews.author: Nathan Friese

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: If we could edit our layouts it would be great. Plus the fact that it took you guys til the end of the games life span to release it for android is why you get 2 stars. Iphones are played out.
reviews.author: Keith Freeman

reviews.title: Official app
reviews.comment: Might as well have it, not that great, adding chat would be nice. Also I don\'t know what the button on the top left corner does, but mine doesn\'t work it just makes the screen go dark and doesn\'t let you do anything.
reviews.author: Angel Reyes

reviews.title: Scroll bug but it\'s a nice app
reviews.comment: HTC Amaze 4g. Pages do not scroll until tilted horizontal then vertical again. Other than that it\'s great!
reviews.author: Kevin Johnson

reviews.title: This  app would be good if I could actually log in :(
reviews.comment: I can\'t even log in I put in my player name and my password am I doing something wrong Fix it I am only giving you a good rating because I know you guys can fix it cause I trust EA
reviews.author: Nick Eaton

reviews.title: Missing stats
reviews.comment: Its great to view my battlefield stats and stuff but my Medal of Honor Warfighter stats don\'t show up. Is there simething I\'m missing?
reviews.author: Jaysen Ding

reviews.title: It\'s good
reviews.comment: But I wish we had the ability to change our loadouts in the app when you\'re away from the game and it transfer into the game when you log in. That\'s just an observation really
reviews.author: Kendall Wright

reviews.title: Poor app
reviews.comment: Using samsung D700..when using app the top left corner menu icon responds but result is a faded animation with invisible buttons
reviews.author: Hansel Gaitan

reviews.title: Galaxy s4
reviews.comment: Great app. I have had no issues but would like to be able to see my platoons wall and check there stats also
reviews.author: Dougie Lopez

reviews.title: Can almost navigate better on the web without app
reviews.comment: Can\'t find out how to easily switch from one platform to another.  Defaults to PC, but I play mostly on 360. Probably uninstalling.
reviews.author: Ryan Schulze

reviews.title: Almost not worth it...
reviews.comment: This app lets you see a lot of usefull info... But why in the world cant i talk to friends to let them know when im gonna be on or anything like that??  Its like EA gave you a big mac combo but without the bigmac... Only fries and drink!
reviews.author: Fabio Murillo

reviews.title: Thank you !
reviews.comment: One issue , I cannot scroll as mentioned by other users of the HTC EVO 3d. Other than that I love it , once I can scroll will give 5 stars.
reviews.author: James Rank

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Not bad could use more options like a chat function more abilities like you can do on the web and be able to answer polls like on the web
reviews.author: franky say relaxx

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: Thank you so much EA. I have been waiting for a good battlelog app.The others are very poor.
reviews.author: Oty Rodriguez

reviews.title: Stable and informative
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t crash constantly like other apps from EA.  Can\'t ask for much more than that!
reviews.author: Alan Li

reviews.title: Great App for Battlefield
reviews.comment: I think this is a great app. It has everything you would see if you were viewing from a PC. I like it.
reviews.author: Westen Jensen

reviews.title: App (BF3 Stats) has a widget.. why don\'t you?
reviews.comment: Since this app is very late in the game on android... Battlelog should have a Widget! Devs, make a widget showing stats and etc. -Thank you...
reviews.author: Bat man
